attributes.action: stop selling the "big issue" online depriving others who sell it on the street of valuable income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would have thought that first as Chancellor, and now as "Prime Minister" you would not have to resort to selling the "Big Issue" online. I can appreciate that whilst you were Chancellor every penny counted, but now you're into the really "big bucks" you should give the guys a chance!

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
